<a id="GDExtensionManager"></a>

# GDExtensionManager

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

Provides access to GDExtension functionality.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The GDExtensionManager loads, initializes, and keeps track of all available [GDExtension](GDExtension.md) libraries in the project.

\ **Note:** Do not worry about GDExtension unless you know what you are doing.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [GDExtension overview](../tutorials/scripting/gdextension/what_is_gdextension.md)

- [GDExtension example in C++](../tutorials/scripting/cpp/gdextension_cpp_example.md)

## Signals

<a id="GDExtensionManager_signal_extension_loaded"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**extension_loaded**\ (\ extension\: [GDExtension](GDExtension.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_signal_extension_loaded)

Emitted after the editor has finished loading a new extension.

\ **Note:** This signal is only emitted in editor builds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_signal_extension_unloading"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**extension_unloading**\ (\ extension\: [GDExtension](GDExtension.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_signal_extension_unloading)

Emitted before the editor starts unloading an extension.

\ **Note:** This signal is only emitted in editor builds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_signal_extensions_reloaded"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**extensions_reloaded**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_signal_extensions_reloaded)

Emitted after the editor has finished reloading one or more extensions.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **LoadStatus**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus)

<a id="GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_OK"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **LOAD_STATUS_OK** = `0`

The extension has loaded successfully.<a id="GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_FAILED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **LOAD_STATUS_FAILED** = `1`

The extension has failed to load, possibly because it does not exist or has missing dependencies.<a id="GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_ALREADY_LOADED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **LOAD_STATUS_ALREADY_LOADED** = `2`

The extension has already been loaded.<a id="GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED** = `3`

The extension has not been loaded.<a id="GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_NEEDS_RESTART"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **LOAD_STATUS_NEEDS_RESTART** = `4`

The extension requires the application to restart to fully load.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="GDExtensionManager_method_get_extension"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[GDExtension](GDExtension.md) **get_extension**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_method_get_extension)

Returns the [GDExtension](GDExtension.md) at the given file `path`, or ``null`` if it has not been loaded or does not exist.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_method_get_loaded_extensions"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **get_loaded_extensions**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_method_get_loaded_extensions)

Returns the file paths of all currently loaded extensions.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_method_is_extension_loaded"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_extension_loaded**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_method_is_extension_loaded)

Returns ``true`` if the extension at the given file `path` has already been loaded successfully. See also [get_loaded_extensions()](GDExtensionManager.md#GDExtensionManager_method_get_loaded_extensions).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_method_load_extension"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **load_extension**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_method_load_extension)

Loads an extension by absolute file path. The `path` needs to point to a valid [GDExtension](GDExtension.md). Returns [LOAD_STATUS_OK](GDExtensionManager.md#GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_OK) if successful.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_method_reload_extension"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **reload_extension**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_method_reload_extension)

Reloads the extension at the given file path. The `path` needs to point to a valid [GDExtension](GDExtension.md), otherwise this method may return either [LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED](GDExtensionManager.md#GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED) or [LOAD_STATUS_FAILED](GDExtensionManager.md#GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_FAILED).

\ **Note:** You can only reload extensions in the editor. In release builds, this method always fails and returns [LOAD_STATUS_FAILED](GDExtensionManager.md#GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_FAILED).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="GDExtensionManager_method_unload_extension"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[LoadStatus](GDExtensionManager.md#enum_GDExtensionManager_LoadStatus) **unload_extension**\ (\ path\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#GDExtensionManager_method_unload_extension)

Unloads an extension by file path. The `path` needs to point to an already loaded [GDExtension](GDExtension.md), otherwise this method returns [LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED](GDExtensionManager.md#GDExtensionManager_constant_LOAD_STATUS_NOT_LOADED).
